<!-- Code generated by generrordocs.go; DO NOT EDIT. -->

```
InvalidExprSwitch occurs when a switch expression is not comparable.

Example:
 func _() {
 	var a struct{ _ func() }
 	switch a /* ERROR cannot switch on a */ {
 	}
 }
```
